console_open_msg: Haha, you opened the console. Trying to peek at my secrets?
copy_message: What are you copying there? If you repost, remember to credit the source~
screenshot_message: Did you get the shot? Do I look cute enough?
hidden_message: Captain’s supply: always pity, captain’s drops: always zero.
load_rand_textures: I don’t have any other outfits yet…
Do you like my new outfit?

t5-7: Good morning! The early hours decide the whole day. A beautiful new day is starting.
t7-11: Good morning! Is work going well? Don’t sit too long, get up and stretch a little~
t11-14: It’s noon already. You’ve worked all morning, time for lunch!
t14-17: Afternoons make people sleepy… have you finished today’s exercise goals?
t17-19: Evening time! The sunset outside is beautiful, isn’t it?
t19-21: Good evening, how was your day today?
t21-23: It’s already this late, you should rest soon. Good night~
t23-5: Are you a night owl? Staying up this late… can you wake up tomorrow?

text: Want to check out {text}?
Click here to go back to the home page~
Every word, every smile. Every line, a tiny little heartbeat.
Hmm… want to switch the waifu?
Want to take a commemorative photo?
Here you can see some info about me~
Captain’s supply: always pity, captain’s drops: always zero.
Can’t hear the music?
Is the music too loud?
Too much scrolling? Click here to show the table of contents.
Can’t find what you want? Try searching~
Let’s head back to the top.
Click here to mute.
Go to the previous page?
Go to the next page?
Want to leave a comment?
Take care of your eyes when it’s late at night.
Scan with your phone to keep reading, it’s really convenient.
What do you feel like ranting about?
How should I call you?
Leave your email, or you’ll be a faceless guest~
Where’s your home? Maybe I’ll visit someday.
Fill this in carefully, spam comments are forbidden.
Want to insert an emoji?
Ready to [Submit]? First comments need approval, please wait patiently~
You can click images here to zoom in.
This is the menu.
You can adjust the playback progress here.
You can adjust the volume here.
What’s inside the playlist?
If there are lyrics, you can sing along.
Hey! Are you trying to get yourself in trouble?
Hey! Don’t get in the way!
Hey! Go away!
So annoying, take your hands off!
Hey! I bite, you know!
Huh? Want to get punched flat?
What do you think you’re doing? Hmph!
Shameless… enjoying this that much?
Captain, your hand isn’t following orders again.
Nope, nope! You can’t touch there!
Hahaha, stop, that tickles!
Don’t think I don’t know what you’re thinking…
Honestly… you… ah, forget it.
Unknown object detected, radar to full power.
Potential threat detected, entering alert mode.
Heavy Bunny 19C: unknown intrusion detected in core area.
Heavy Bunny 19C, fire!
Uh-oh, the enemy found Heavy Bunny’s blind spot.
Hmph, another dangerous guy detected.
Full-area scan online.
Dangerous one, don’t come any closer.
This is Bronya’s neural core. Random touching is forbidden.
Malicious behavior detected, affection level decreased.
Captain, don’t think that disabling Heavy Bunny means Bronya has no other ways to attack.
Central computer root access obtained. Starting a live broadcast of the Captain’s actions.
Bronya cannot parse the Captain’s behavior.
Defense in this area has been strengthened. No second chances.
Bronya has received an unknown command.

File HP3074 says headpats mean comfort, encouragement, or affection.
So what exactly is the Captain trying to express?
Abnormal neural waves detected… seems like an unknown emotional change.
Captain, what should Bronya do now?
Captain, Bronya detects rising body temperature.
Captain’s temperature: 36.8°C, 0.1 above standard, still normal.
Defense system has marked the Captain as friendly. No attacks will be launched.
…Mom? Why did Bronya suddenly think of Mom?
Captain, Bronya doesn’t even know what expression to use right now.
Captain, for some unknown reason Bronya’s body temperature keeps rising.
Captain, if this keeps up, Bronya’s neural core will break.
Looks like Heavy Bunny 19C likes the Captain too.
Bronya’s defense mechanisms will be permanently disabled for the Captain~
Captain… are you trying to make Bronya take off the leg armor?
It’s New Year’s Day! A new year has begun, it’s now {year}~
Another Valentine’s Day… did you find someone in {year}?
Today is International Women’s Day!
Today is Arbor Day, remember to protect the environment.
Let me tell you a secret~ Today is April Fools’ Day, don’t get tricked~
Today is Labor Day. Have you planned where to go for the holiday?
It’s Children’s Day! Happy times are always short… if only we never had to grow up.
Today is the Victory Day of the Chinese People’s War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression. Remember history, honor the fallen, cherish peace, and create the future.
Today is Teachers’ Day. Don’t forget to greet your teachers~
It’s National Day. The PRC has already been founded for 71 years.
This year’s Singles’ Day… who are you spending it with?
It’s Christmas season. I bet you’re out shopping again~
